responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can guide you through Diabetes tracking, Blood pressure tracking, Hospitals and Pharmacies
Offering support for Diabetes tracking, Blood pressure, Hospitals and Pharmacies

patterns: Want to measure insulin level in my body
responses:
To know insulin level please copy the given link. It will suggests you some apps that you can download to know the insulin level: 
 https://www.healthline.com/health/diabetes/top-iphone-android-apps#fooducate

patterns: I want to search for blood pressure result history
Show blood pressure results for patient
Find blood pressure results by ID
responses:
To know the blood pressure please copy the given link. It will suggests you some apps that you can download to know the blood pressure : 
 https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/320095#Blood-Pressure-Companion

To get pharmacies list copy the following link : 
 https://www.medicineindia.org/pharmacies-chemists-drugstores-in-india

patterns: Searching for hospital to transfer patient
I want to search hospital data
responses:
To get hospitals list copy the following link : 
 https://www.medicineindia.org/hospitals-in-india
